Package etithespirit.orimod.lighttech

Class AssemblyHelper

java.lang.Object
etithespirit.orimod.lighttech.AssemblyHelper
public final class AssemblyHelper extends Object
A close cousin to ConnectionHelper that specializes in Assemblies rather than direct neighbor connections.

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • MAX_SUCCESSFUL_TILE_COUNT

      public static final int MAX_SUCCESSFUL_TILE_COUNT
      The maximum amount of successful neighbors that will be scanned. Failing neighbors do not count to this limit.

      A successful neighbor counts as a neighbor that is an instance of AbstractLightEnergyLink
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • AssemblyHelper

      public AssemblyHelper(Assembly forAsm, AbstractLightEnergyHub initialHub)
      Creates a new helper for the given assembly and the first hub that is responsible for the creation of that assembly.
      Parameters:
      forAsm - The assembly to create for.
      initialHub - The hub that this assembly was created by.

  • Method Details

    • mergeWith

      public void mergeWith(AssemblyHelper other)
      Merges other into this instance of AssemblyHelper.
      Parameters:
      other - The other helper to merge into this.

    • getHubs

      public List<AbstractLightEnergyHub> getHubs()
      Returns:
      All hubs that are part of the assembly this works alongside.

    • getLinks

      public List<AbstractLightEnergyLink> getLinks()
      Returns:
      All links that are part of the assembly this works alongside.

    • forceRecalculateConnections

      public void forceRecalculateConnections()
      Note: This method may be expensive to call.
      Forcefully recalculate all connected instances of AbstractLightEnergyLink and AbstractLightEnergyHub.

    • manuallyRegisterLink

      Throws:

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
